name: Bombertale (vadimburym)
description:
The rules of the game are simple: plant bombs, destroy walls, kill monsters! After killing all the monsters in the level, look for a way out of the level.
Earn points by completing random levels and unlocking unique levels for which you can get even more points!

The basis of the game is random levels and a total score, but there are unique levels here, you can open access to complete random levels for them.

Later achievements and contests will be added for which you can receive various rewards, including dollars.
